segments.text: I walk in and immediately notice the faucet blasting water into the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's full and starting to spill over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman there is totally absorbed in her plate drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't glanced down at the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy's on a stool that's leaning back precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his arm in the cookie jar, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby is reaching up, eyes wide with expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame them like a picture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's trickling down the cabinet doors now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden seems serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how unaware they all are of the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect to see kids raiding cookies mid-flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup is oddly comical in its disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Can't look away from this unfolding scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
